item.title: Polishing your tools
item.description: The toolsmith Frederick P Brooks, Jr quoted / explained a theory explained by Mills and Baker1 around 1971-72: Chapter 3: The Surgical Team […] but the team be organized like a surgical team rather than a hog-butchering team.
